Player History
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/27/1985 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Texas to Los Angeles on 8/1/1988 (Going to TEX: 3B Craig Grebeck, P Tim Scott. Going to LAD: SS Greg Gagne, 2B Johnny Ray)...
Had first career hit on 8/2/1988, off David West (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/3/1988, off Alejandro Pena (NYM)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1988...
Injured on 7/20/1989 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/15/1990 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by New York (Y) on 7/19/1990.
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/25/1991 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
